Performances > September 1982: The Nine-Tailed Fox

September 1982: The Nine-Tailed Fox

Plays:

The Nine-Tailed Fox (玉藻前曦袂)

Scenes:

Mt. Shamuro in India (天竺沙牟呂山の段　)

At the Foot of Mt. Shamuro (天竺沙牟呂山麓)

King Hanzoku's Palace (班足王御殿)

Dakki Going to the Palace (妲妃入内)

The Palace of Emperor Chu (紂王御殿化粧殿)

The Castle Gate (楼門)

The Kiyomizu Temple (清水寺)

Michiharu's Mansion (道春館)

The Shinsen Garden (神泉苑)

The Corridor (廊下)

The House of Jussaku (十作住家)

The Trial (訴訟)

The Prayer (祈り)

Characters:

Fumei-choja (普明長者)

Bachushi (農夫馬忠子)

Lady Kayo, in fact a fox (花陽夫人実は妖狐 )

Dakki, in fact a fox (妲妃,玉藻前実は妖狐)

Queen Saiki (采姫夫人)

King Hanzoku (班足王 )

Guard (警固の役人)

Kinshiren (錦糸蓮 )

Kinsha (錦舎)

Bun-o (西伯文王)

Hichukan (飛仲官)

Emperor Chu (殷の紂王 )

Raishin (雷震 )

Taikobo (太公望)

Prince Usugumo (薄雲皇子)

Inubuchi (犬淵源蔵)

Katsura (桂姫)

Unemenosuke (安倍采女之助)

Kintoji (鷲塚金藤次)

Haginokata (萩の方)

Shigeyuki (中納言重之卿)

Hatsuhana, later Lady Tamamo (初花姫後に玉藻前)

Jintahei, a servant (仕丁甚太平)

Heisaku, a servant (仕丁平作)

Ayame (菖蒲前 )

Empress Bifuku (美福門院 )

Katsuragi (葛城前)

Chitose (千歳前)

Jussaku (猟師十作 )

Taruhiko (酒辺の樽彦 )

Onoroku, in fact Miuranosuke (黒髪山の斧六実は三浦之助)

Buddhist priest (逮夜坊主)

Kamazo, in fact Kazusanosuke (鍋かけの釜蔵実は上総之助 )

Oyana (娘おやな)

Kamegiku (Oyana, infact Kamegiku) (おやな実は傾城亀菊 )

Dairoku (矢田の大六 )

Mojino, a girl attendant (禿文字野)

Court Lady (内侍の局)

Prime Minister Machikane (持兼の宰相)

Osue, a maid servant (お末)

Court noble (右大弁)

Yasunari (安倍泰成)

Country girl (在所娘)

Masseur (座頭)

God of thunder, the (雷)

Man in a livery coat (いなせな男)

Street girl (夜鷹)

Servant (奴)

Courtesan (女郎)

Lion (獅子)

Lady Tamamo, in fact a fox (玉藻前実は妖狐)
